knora-api:DateValue.rdfs:comment: Represents a date as a period with different possible precisions.
knora-api:DateValue.rdfs:label: Date value

knora-api:ForbiddenResource.rdfs:comment: A ForbiddenResource is a proxy for a resource that the client has insufficient permissions to see.
knora-api:ForbiddenResource.rdfs:label: A ForbiddenResource is a proxy for a resource that the client has insufficient permissions to see.

knora-api:LinkValue.rdfs:comment: Represents a link from one resource to another.
knora-api:LinkValue.rdfs:label: Link value

knora-api:ListValue.rdfs:comment: Represents a value in a hierarchical list.
knora-api:ListValue.rdfs:label: List value

knora-api:MovingImageFileValue.rdfs:comment: Represents a moving image file value.
knora-api:MovingImageFileValue.rdfs:label: Moving image file value

knora-api:MovingImageRepresentation.rdfs:comment: A Resource containing moving image data
knora-api:MovingImageRepresentation.rdfs:label: Representation (Movie)

knora-api:Region.rdfs:comment: Represents a geometric region of a resource. The geometry is represented currently as JSON string.
knora-api:Region.rdfs:label: Region

knora-api:Representation.rdfs:comment: A Resource that can store one or more FileValues
knora-api:Representation.rdfs:label: Representation

knora-api:StillImageFileValue.rdfs:comment: Represents a still image file value.
knora-api:StillImageFileValue.rdfs:label: Still image file value

knora-api:StillImageRepresentation.rdfs:label: Representation (Image)

knora-api:audioFileValueHasDuration.rdfs:label: Audio file value has duration

knora-api:booleanValueAsBoolean.rdfs:label: Boolean value as decimal

knora-api:canBeInstantiated.rdfs:label: can be instantiated

knora-api:colorValueAsColor.rdfs:label: Color value as color

knora-api:hasAudioFileValue.rdfs:label: has audio file

knora-api:hasMovingImageFileValue.rdfs:label: has movie file

knora-api:isEditable.rdfs:label: is editable

knora-api:isInherited.rdfs:label: is inherited

knora-api:isLinkProperty.rdfs:label: is link property

knora-api:isPartOf.rdfs:label: is part of

knora-api:isRegionOf.rdfs:label: is region of

knora-api:movingImageFileValueHasQuality.rdfs:label: Moving image file value has quality level
